title: Twitter Said to Delay Changes to Check Mark Badges Until After Midterms
description: Users and employees had raised concerns that Elon Musk’s plan to give check marks to those who paid a monthly fee could be misused to sow discord.
dc:creator: Ryan Mac, Kate Conger and Mike Isaac

media:content.media:description: Charging for the verification check mark program had been one of the changes made by Twitter’s new owner, Elon Musk.
